## v0.4.0 (2025-03-21)

### Feature

(e.g. `--exclude public.table`) ([`88130f4`](https://github.com/educationwarehouse/edwh-devdb-plugin/commit/88130f4e9067582cda820c91d0f5cc3d86230590))

## v0.3.1 (2025-03-21)

### Fix
